metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29963 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Address bar search suggestions in private browsing mode were re-using session data from normal mode. *This bug only affects Firefox for Android. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 89.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
